meanings.definition: Relating to the study or interpretation of icons or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The art historian gave an iconological explanation of the painting, focusing on its symbolic meanings.
meanings.sent2: The museum curator's iconological approach helped visitors understand the significance of the ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The iconological analysis of the emoji usage in the chat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her iconological perspective on the logo revealed hidden layers of meaning.
meanings.sent5: The iconological nature of the hieroglyphics made deciphering them a fascinating challenge.

meanings.definition: Involving the analysis of visual representations or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The iconological examination of the advertisement revealed its underlying messages.
meanings.sent2: The artist's iconological approach to his work added depth to its interpretation.
meanings.sent3: The iconological investigation of the traffic signs amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: His iconological view of the movie poster highlighted its clever use of imagery.
meanings.sent5: The iconological analysis of the logo's design elements was enlightening.
